sentence: We share our experiences in developing and implementing a departmental inclusive teaching series that included: (i) discussions of modern pedagogical literature and community knowledge-sharing, (ii) interactive workshops led by educational experts, and (iii) a graduate PD course module whereby students design lessons and practice teaching (Fig. 1).

We share our experiences in developing and implementing a departmental inclusive teaching series that included: (i) discussions of modern pedagogical literature and community knowledge-sharing, (ii) interactive workshops led by educational experts, and (iii) a graduate PD course module whereby students design lessons and practice teaching (Fig. 1).

We share our experiences in developing and implementing a departmental inclusive teaching series that included: (i) discussions of modern pedagogical literature and community knowledge-sharing, (ii) interactive workshops led by educational experts, and (iii) a graduate PD course module whereby students design lessons and practice teaching (Fig. 1).
